channel.title: Moe Community Cloud Newsletter
channel.description: Daily signals on AI, cloud, automation, and digital infrastructure — focused on ownership, systems, and monetization.

item.title: Issue 1 — AI Is Getting Cheaper — Control Is Getting More Expensive
item.description: Generation costs drop fast. Governance, ownership, auditability, and operations become the real premium.

item.title: Issue 2 — AI Repair Is the Next Gold Rush
item.description: The second wave isn’t adoption — it’s repair: audits, stabilization, ops layers, and governance.

item.title: Issue 3 — Cloud-Only Is Quietly Becoming a Liability
item.description: Hybrid and local-first aren’t anti-cloud — they’re pro-control. Leverage comes from optionality.

item.title: Issue 4 — Agent Ops Beats Prompt Engineering Every Time
item.description: Great prompts don’t save broken systems. Operations turns AI into infrastructure.

item.title: Issue 5 — AI Compliance Is Becoming the New Gatekeeper
item.description: “It works” isn’t enough. Audit trails, controls, and documentation decide who gets paid.

item.title: Issue 6 — Owning Infrastructure Beats Owning IP
item.description: IP can be copied. Infrastructure compounds. Ownership of outcomes outlasts hype cycles.

item.title: Issue 7 — Why Moe Community Cloud Exists
item.description: A weekend reflection: no trends, no noise — just structure for builders who want leverage.
